___fieldName.description: A string value representing the name of the field to query.

___type.description: The field type for the specified field parameter.

___utcValue.description: An integer value representing exact UNIX time used when `defaultValue` is a date string.

oneOf.description: Value given automatically if none provided.

___defaultValue.description: The default value that is automatically given if nothing is provided.

___parameterId.description: Number given to uniquely identify the specified parameter.
